COMMENTS: Any invalid answer given as user’s keyboard input.
en: Please enter a valid answer ($(DechoHighlight 'yes') or ($(DechoHighlight 'no')) !
fr: Veuillez entrer une réponse valide ($(DechoHighlight 'oui') ou ($(DechoHighlight 'non')) !

COMMENTS: Asking to the user if (s)he wants to continue the script’s execution.
en: Do you want to continue the script's execution ? (yes / no)
fr: Souhaitez-vous continuer l’exécution du script ?(oui / non)

COMMENTS: Asking a keyboard input to the user.
Displaying the message of resumption of the script’s execution.
en: Resuming the execution of the $(DechoHighlight "$__BU_MAIN_PROJECT_NAME") script.

COMMENTS: Displaying the cancellation message of the script execution.
No value is passed as a mandatory function’s argument.
fr: LE PARAMÈTRE $(KeepFormatting "$(CutFromCharacter "$p_funcname")'s") $(DechoHighlight "$(ToLowercase "$(echo -n '$')$p_argname")") N’A PAS DE VALEUR

COMMENTS: The value passed as mandatory function’s argument is not an alphabetic string.
en: THE $(KeepFormatting "$(CutFromCharacter "$p_funcname")'s") $(DechoHighlight "$(ToLowercase "$(echo -n '$')$p_argname")") PARAMETER'S VALUE IS NOT AN ALPHABETIC STRING
fr: LA VALEUR DU PARAMÈTRE $(KeepFormatting "$(CutFromCharacter "$p_funcname")'s") $(DechoHighlight "$(ToLowercase "$(echo -n '$')$p_argname")") N’EST PAS UNE CHAÎNE DE CARACTÈRES ALPHABÉTIQUE
